tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE match_results (
    match_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    home_team VARCHAR,
    away_team VARCHAR,
    home_team_goals INT,
    away_team_goals INT
);

CREATE TABLE match (
  match_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  team_id INT,
  opponent VARCHAR(50),
  date DATE,
  result VARCHAR(10)
);

CREATE TABLE players (
    player_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    player_name VARCHAR(50),
    goals_scored INT,
    assists INT,
    yellow_cards INT
);

CREATE TABLE matches (
    match_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    home_team_id INT,
    away_team_id INT,
    match_date DATE,
    match_result VARCHAR(10)
);

CREATE TABLE player_stats (
    player_id INT,
    match_id INT,
    goals_scored INT,
    assists INT,
    yellow_cards INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (player_id) REFERENCES players(player_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (match_id) REFERENCES matches(match_id)
);
